dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice: http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovi
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2005 4:49 PM
To: jmello@nutechdvd.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice:
http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovies.htm

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Joel Mello <jmello@nutechdvd.com>
To: <webmaster@hentaiempire.net>
Date: Monday, January 24, 2005, 1:31:32 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice:
http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovies.htm

===8<==============Original message text===============
January 24, 2005

DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice

Copyright Violations on: http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovies.htm



Dear Sir or Madam,



I am contacting you on behalf of Nutech Digital Inc, a DVD production
and distribution company headquartered in Los Angeles, California.  It
has recently come to our attention that your website
(http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovies.htm) is using our copyright
protected materials (movies, trailers, screenshots or box covers)
without permission. As such, we are hereby requesting that you
immediately remove the offending material outlined below and notify us
upon completion.



A copy of this notice has been filed with your hosting provider and/or
credit card processor, and we encourage them to immediately disable your
account until you have removed the offending content and we have checked
to ensure none of our work is still present on your web site.



As per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998
(http://www.copyright.gov/legislation/dmca.pdf), we are required to
submit six key elements to qualify this email as a valid DMCA complaint.



1)     Physical or electronic signature on behalf of copyright holder
Nutech Digital, Inc



This email is signed and sent by Joel Mello, an authorized employee and
representative of copyright holder Nutech Digital, Inc.



2)     Identification of the copyrighted work owned by Nutech Digital,
Inc



Kokudo Oh

Shusaku Replay

Words Worth

E'L

Luv Wave

Genmukan

Depravity

Pure Mail

Welcome to Pia Carrot

Custom Slave

Immoral Sisters

Shusaku

Dark Shell 2

Flashback

Leatherman

D+Vine LUV

Imma Seiden

The Bizarre Cage

School of Darkness



Also see http://www.nutechdvd.com/our_content.asp for a live listing of
all content to which Nutech Digital owns exclusive reproduction rights.
If not explicitly noted above, all content on this page is applicable to
this complaint.



3)     Identification of the infringing material (web pages) to be
removed



http://hentaiempire.net/empire/hentaimovies.htm



4)     Contact information for Nutech Digital, Inc



WWW.NUTECHDVD.COM <http://www.nutechdvd.com/>

INFO@NUTECHDVD.COM



NUTECH DIGITAL, INC

7900 GLORIA AVE

VAN NUYS, CA 91406

(818) 994-3831



5)     Statement that above use is unauthorized by Nutech Digital, Inc



I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the material
in the manner complained of is not authorized by me, the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law.



6)     Statement that above information is true and accurate

            I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of
the United States, that the information in this notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set
out in this notification.



Only after the offending content has been removed will we allow the
hosting provider and/or credit card processor to enable your website.
Please visit http://www.nutechdvd.com/our_content.asp to see a current
list of titles to which we own the exclusive distribution rights.
Titles listed on our content page may not be used without prior written
authorization from Nutech Digital, Inc. This includes, but is not
limited to, the use of video files, screen shots, trailers, box covers
and titles.



If you know of a website that you suspect is illegally offering our
content for sale or download, we urge you to anonymously report it to us
through a special web page we have created:
http://www.nutechdvd.com/reportfraud.asp.  We investigate all tips that
we receive from this page, sending DMCA copyright infringement notices
when needed.



Thank you for your cooperation, we look forward to your swift resolution
to this matter.



Sincerely,

Joel Mello for Nutech Digital, Inc

- --

Nutech Digital, Inc

7900 Gloria Ave

Van Nuys, CA 91406

(818) 994-3831


===8<===========End of original message text===========
